basics.name: Cody Kau
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

highlights: Manage air monitoring documentation and reports
Conducts laboratory analysis and processes HAZMAT samples (such as Asbestos or Lead)
Data entry
Accurately handle cash transactions in a fast-paced environment while also providing great customer service
Assess situations where a customer needs assistance and quickly resolve any problems if they arise
Assist the cashier by packing the shopping cart, replacing items for the customer, etc
Oversee the kitchen and restaurant area and ensure the quality of the food before it is sent out
Delegate roles in the kitchen to clean and prep when there are no orders
Take inventory of ingredients and communicate it to the manager
Open the restaurant and prepare the ingredients for the day
Close the restaurant and accurately count the cash received for the day
Manage breaks for employees
Resolve problems with customers quickly and effectively

work.company: Learning Assistance Center, University of Hawaii at Manoa
highlights: Prepare lesson plans for a one hour tutoring session
Tutor one on one with students three times a week
Be able to adjust teaching style depending on each different student
Ensure food quality and food safety procedure are followed every hour
Delegate roles and designate times for employees to take breaks
During the graveyard shift, break down the food stations and properly clean it
Handle customer complaints and resolve any issues swiftly and fairly
Edited a game show for high school students called "Itâ€™s Academic Hawaii"
Ensure that the audio and video are of quality
Created videos about the Waianae community
